author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Indivior Expects High Teens Effective Tax Rate For 2018​
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Indivior Plc:
* INDIVIOR PROVIDES UPDATE ON TAX POSITION * ‍EXPECTS ITS FUTURE US AFTER-TAX INCOME TO BE POSITIVELY IMPACTED BY RECENTLY-LEGISLATED CHANGES TO US CORPORATE TAXES​
* ‍EXPECTS A HIGH TEENS EFFECTIVE TAX RATE FOR 2018​ * ‍ESTIMATED IMPACT OF THIS WILL BE A ONE-OFF NON-CASH CHARGE TO COMPANY‘S AFTER-TAX INCOME OF APPROXIMATELY $15 MILLION THAT WILL IMPACT Q4 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
